summary: A powerful and cute female mage follower
descriptionHtml:
Name: Morgana
Version: 1.0
Date: 2013/05/19



------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

Howdy everybody! Let my introduce my new companion Morgana.


  \"IT WAS LIKE NIGHTMARE BUT IT WAS THE REALITY.
 I DON`T KNOW MY PARENTS AND I HAVE NEVER HAD A REAL FAMILY. 
MAYBE MY PARENTS WERE MAGES, MAYBE NOT.
NOBODY TOLD ME THE TRUTH.
NINETEEN YEARS  ONLY MAGES, VICIOUS ARTISTS OF NECROMANCY, SURROUNDED ME.
 I GREW UP IN THE WORLD OF SPELLS AND HORROR. 
BUT THE NINE KEPT MY SOUL AND ONE DAY I RUN AWAY FROM THE EVIL.
 I WAS EAGER TO START THE NEW LIFE AMONG HEALTHY JOYFUL PEOPLE NOT PALE INSANE MAGES, UNDEAD AND VAMPIRES.
 I DREAMED TO BREATH WITH FRESH AIR OF FREEDOM. AND ONE DAY I MET DOVAKIN...\"

 (MORGANA)



Morgana is a Nord.
Eyes: Green
Hair: Dark
Class: Conjuration Mage and Necromancer
Specialization; Conjuration, Destruction, Healing
Calculated Level 10 to 70
Essential and also can be married.
Initial Clothes; Necromancer Robe
Initial Weapon:  Steel Dagger



-------------------[Location]-------------------------------

Vilemyr Tavern, Ivarstead



------------------- [Install] -----------------------


Please copy and overwrite in the \\ Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNMorgana.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod

ATTENTION! Before deleting mod you must \"dismiss\" Morgana else you won`t be able to hire another companion, custom or vanila!



------------------- [Requirements] -----------------------

Skyrim 1.8 or higher

IMPORTANT! YOU MUST INSTALL APACHI SKYHAIR 1.5 and APACHI SKYHAIR FEMALE 1_3. The game won`t load without these mods!
Avaliable here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?


Other mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701

Mod is compartible to
UNP Body Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

or CBBE Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/? 
VAnilla Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits to the modders whose mods are mentioned above!

Also highly recommended Female Facial Animations by nao4288 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35303//?




------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------


Feel free to modify, reuse or reupload just give me credit.
Thank  Bethesda for a  great game


Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
